name: Cavefish Zombie
movement: swimming speed of 40 feet, walking speed of 20 feet
description: The Cavefish Zombie is an undead creature resembling a reanimated fish, characterized by a grotesque appearance from its aquatic life.
memorable: It has a debilitating stench that can poison nearby creatures and the ability to potentially avoid death with its Undead Fortitude.
goals: To thrive in aquatic environments and attack any nearby creatures.
relations: Often found with other undead creatures in watery locales, potentially serving dark masters or haunting submerged ruins.
environment: Typically found in aquatic environments, such as lakes or rivers.
strengths: Possesses Damage Immunities to poison and the ability to evade death through Undead Fortitude.
weaknesses: Limited in versatility due to low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, making it poor in mental and social encounters.
attacks: Uses a melee Slam attack that deals bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Stench ability can poison any creature starting its turn near it, imposing significant combat disadvantages.
senses: Has darkvision that allows it to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
additional_information: Average speed of 20 feet on land.
Weak to radiant damage and critical hits.
Can remain in combat with Undead Fortitude.
Easy to hit due to low AC.
test_queries: undead fish monster with debilitating stench
reanimated aquatic creature that inflicts poison
creature that swims and can evade death
zombie that thrives in underwater environments
